thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: usual standard
thread.title_full: usual standard - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: derek g
title: usual standard
text:
This was ideal for visiting the tower of London, HMS Belfast and Tower Bridge.
We even walked to the millennium bridge. The nearest tube was about a fifteen minuets walk, about a tenner in a taxi. we had a few days break and enjoyed the area although using the tube you can access most anywhere. A good tip on the underground is instead of using oyster cards you can swipe your switch card if its contactless and its the same price.
